  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutInline {a} at (0,0) size 387x17 [color=#000080]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 44x17
            text run at (0,0) width 44: "Hover "
          LayoutInline {strong} at (0,0) size 31x17
            LayoutText {#text} at (43,0) size 31x17
              text run at (43,0) width 31: "here"
          LayoutText {#text} at (73,0) size 153x17
            text run at (73,0) width 153: " and the background of "
          LayoutInline {span} at (0,0) size 158x17

              text run at (225,0) width 158: "this text should go green"
          LayoutText {#text} at (382,0) size 5x17
